"Options":
"This will reset all options.
Are you sure?"
"Are you sure you want to save these settings?"
"Are you sure you want to discard changes?"

"Set whether the radar will rotate
to follow the camera's orientation."

"Enable or disable the video playback
in-game (such as on the monitors in the ARKS Lobby).
※Requires a restart to take effect."
"If enabled, offensive language will not be displayed in-game."

"Select how lock-on functions.
Determine whether to lock on by
clicking the button once, or holding the button."

"Sets how to switch the palette.

Select to toggle switching only while holding the button."

"You can set the interval for the avoidance action
using ([W]/[A]/[S]/[D]) movement keys on the keyboard."

"Set whether to save the party settings,
even after logging out and changing blocks.
The party setting will be saved until you exit the game."
"Determines if the lock-on target will be changed using <%RStick>."

"You can set whether or not to show the ARKS Road
Navigation icon, indicating your next goal."
"Set whether or not to draw attention to events by prompting you to hold <%Access>."
"Set whether or not to automatically pick up Meseta when it is nearby."
"Select whether to show other party's names as dark blue or white"

"The color displayed of the HP bar when
hit with Strike, Ranged or Tech damage."

"Set the default party name
(if no party name is set)."

"Autoselects beginner blocks or random
blocks when using a Lv.20↓ character."
"Choose whether to display selected subpalette entry."

"Select the rarity at which rare drop notifications
will appear upon a rare item dropping."

"When 13★ or higher items drop, this setting
will deposit them directly to your inventory instead
of in the field to protect against forgotten drops."

"倉庫端末や、マイショップ出品時、
NPCショップでのアイテム売買において、
倉庫UIが表示された時の初期カーソル位置を設定します。"
"Configure pet HP bar and status icon appearance."

"While the radar map is magnified,
you can change the temporary magnification
settings when an E-trial occurs."
"通信状態を表す画面表示内容を設定します。"
"During Dark Blast, you can set a dedicated voice."

"複数ブロックマッチングの対象クエストを受注する時
カーソル位置をどちらのボタンにするかを設定します。
\u3000※一部クエストを除きます"

"Changes how the Character Menu is
displayed when selecting others."

"Set whether or not to display an icon for players in need of revival.
\u3000※You can still receive bonuses even if the icon is not displayed"

"Enable or disable the window
when a party invitation is received."

"Enable or disable the window
when a friend request is received."

"Enable or disable the window
when a Team invitation is received."

"Enable or disable the window
when a trade request is received."

"Set whether to log a notification
upon receiving an item."

"通知メッセージの表示数について、
単一に限定するか複数表示するか設定します。"

"おすすめクエストを受注したとき、
おすすめオーダーのウインドウを表示するかを設定します。"

"Configure whether or not a notification is displayed
when a party member collects a rare item."

"プレミアムセットの有効期限が7日を切っていたら
ログイン時に通知するかを設定します。"

"Enable or disable the confirmation window
when the party leader starts a multi-block quest."

"When using the mouse, choose whether to prioritize
the camera or the mouse cursor."
"Use Channel Color for Chat Input Background"
"Set whether to quote mail in replies."

"Set whether to show the interface
(including windows) in screenshots."

"If you have Auto Words set,
choosing \"Disable\" will prevent
them from triggering."
"Turns on the Auto Words of Other Players."

"If enabled, all keyboard buttons will
only be used for chat.
※[ScrollLock] will change this setting at any time."
"Select what content to display in the log window's \"View All\" tab."
"Set whether to show Auto Words in the chatlog."

"Turn off the ability for the Scroll Lock key to toggle direct chat.

If direct chat is not working properly, try turning ON
this setting - There's a possibility that will fix it."
"Select whether to show or hide symbol arts."

"When you log in,
send Login Call to friends."

"Sets the background color of the chat
that corresponds to who you're talking to."

"Choose whether to display indicators
for incapacitated party members.
Does not apply to Friend/Support/Free Partners."

"Choose whether to allow other players to
see an indicator if you are incapacitated.
If a player has this setting turned off,
you will not receive the indicator."
"Set whether to display the Player ID name or the Character name in Team Chat and Whispers."

"This will reset all windows to their initial positions and default sizes.
Are you sure you wish to continue?"
"This will reset the size and location of all windows."

"Humanoid-type and Cast bodies are synchronized.
However, you can individually edit them by
selecting \"Discrete Physique Editing\"."

"キャラクタークリエイトおよびエステで選択する
ヘアスタイル・ヘッドパーツ・アクセサリーウィンドウの
タイプを設定します。"

"種族キャストの場合でも、着るコスチュームによってはヒト型の体型に
なりますが、この場合の「ヒト型の体型」と「キャスト型の体型」を
自動的に同期するか、個別に編集できるようにするかを選択できます。"
"Select the format to use for screenshots."

"Set whether to show the interface
(including windows) in screenshots.
※Only applies to in-game functions."

"Enable or disable effect lighting.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"エフェクトに関係するライティング効果のON/OFFを切り替えます。"

"Enable or disable terrain lighting effects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"地形に関係するライティング効果のON/OFFを切り替えます。"

"Creates an effect on the screen when
viewing very bright objects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"明るい部分にフィルターをかけることにより、
画面全体をよりきれいに見せる効果です。"

"Simulate natural atmospheric blurring for distant objects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"遠くの光景をぼかすことで自然な雰囲気を出すことができます。"

"Enable or disable representation of sunbeams.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"光が太陽を中心に拡散する表現のON/OFFを切り替えます。"

"Enable or disable the blur effect.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"ブラー効果のON/OFFを切り替えます。"

"Enable or disable anti-aliasing.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"アンチエイリアシング効果のON/OFFを切り替えます。"

"Enable or disable soft particle effects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"ソフトパーティクル効果のON/OFFを切り替えます。"

"Darken the shadows cast by edges.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"エッジの影を濃くして、写実性を高めます。"

"Dim the screen's edges.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"画面の外縁部を暗めに調整します。"

"Adjust the amount of light emitted by the camera, affecting the brightness of the screen.
Setting to 0 will improve performance slightly."

"Adjust overall brightness, color, and contrast for each field.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"全体の色調やコントラスト、明るさをフィールド毎に調整します。"

"Adjust amount of light applied to objects' edges.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."
"オブジェクトの周囲にかかる光量を調整します。"

"Adjust intensity of light produced by certain effects.
Setting to \"Reduced\" will dim these effects."

"Allow resolution to be automatically decreased in order to maintain a smooth framerate.
Disabling will allow framerate to drop during heavy processing."

"Set how many player characters to
display in full detail, such as showing equipment
Lowering the count will improve performance."

"Set the quality of water reflection.
Lowing the value will improve performance slightly."

"Set the quality of shadow rendering.
Lowing the value will improve performance slightly."

"Set the screen's brightness.
Lowering the value will reduce the brightness of the entire screen."

"Set how many Photon Blasts to display.
Displaying fewer will ease processing."

"Set the volume of the video displayed
on the ARKS monitors installed in the lobby and for some cutscenes as well."

"Set whether to play sound when
game window is not in focus."
"武器パレット切り替えの操作が一部制限されます"
"サブパレット切り替えの操作が一部制限されます"

"This will determine if the [Rear left button] is a trigger.
(This only works for analog controllers)
Please press the button that is glowing in the figure below.

If nothing happens when you press it, the controller isn't analog.
Please press $(0) to perform button configuration on the next screen."

"This will determine if the [Rear right button] is a trigger.
(This only works for analog controllers)
Please press the button that is glowing in the figure below.

If nothing happens when you press it, the controller isn't analog.
Please press $(0) to perform button configuration on the next screen."

"This will reset the controller to its defaults.
Continue?"
"This pad does not support automatic configuration."

"Here, you can match the buttons on your controller with the

Press the [Change] button, then match the
[Display Button] with the button on your controller."
"The gamepad will be set automatically. You can also manually configure the gamepad."

"「プレミアムセット」の有効期間中のみご利用いただけます。
PC版では、ゲームランチャーの環境設定「描画/シェーダー品質」が

"The appearance of other players' Dark Blasts will be based on what they have chosen in their settings.
On PC, this only applies when \"Drawing/Shader Quality\" is not set to \"Simple\"."

"Other players' Dark Blasts will always appear as Dark Blast Auras.
On PC, this only applies when \"Drawing/Shader Quality\" is not set to \"Simple\"."

"If a gamepad is used to play this game, the keyboard
will still be used for chat and as such, other
controls will be available as well.

These settings can be changed at any time
by selecting [Reset to Defaults] from the Options menu.

Which device would you like to use?"

"You can switch between different button types:
- 2-Button Type (default)
- 3-Button Type

With 3-Button Type, you'll have more
PA/Tech slots than the normal 2-Button Type.
You can change this setting anytime from within
the options, under \"Control Settings\"

Which button type would you like to use?"
